title: Four Weddings
overview: Four Weddings follows a similar style to Come Dine with Me and involves four brides/grooms attending each other's weddings and rating them on:Dress (out of 10), Venue (out of 10), Food (out of 10), Overall Experience (out of 10)At the end of the show, they'll discover which of the couples has won a luxury honeymoon. Viewers can also play online in the "Online wedding rater" and rate the weddings as they are shown for comparison with the rest of the public.
